column3: I understand the motivation -- I use the internal miner every day on testnet -- but this change would defeat anyone who scripts setgenerate-on-startup, because it does not automatically re-enable mining once IBD is complete.\n

You are right, but to automatically enable the miner it would still be possible to use -gen or set it via the bitcoin.conf. But if you see no way that this options suffice, you are free to close the pull.\n
